name: Arcania: Fall of Setarrif
summary: A new threat casts its shadow over the Southern Isles. A mysterious demon, consumed by hatred, terrifies the population and pools his force against the coastal city of Setarrif. The dramatic situation exacerbates after a volcanic eruption in the mountains nearby. Thereupon the nameless hero joins forces with his strongest allies and courageously faces the new menace.

esrb.synopsis: This is a fantasy role-playing game in which players assume the role of a warrior who fights against demonic forces in a fictional kingdom. As players complete missions and interact with various characters, they use swords, bows, and magical attacks to kill human foes and fantasy creatures (e.g., goblins, golems, skeletons). Battles depict melee-style combat, accompanied by shrieks and cries of pain as enemies are slashed, electrocuted, or lit on fire. Injured characters emit brief spurts of blood when hit. Some quests demand the slaying of specific adversaries (e.g., a pack of 12 “demon wolves”), and players may be rewarded with experience/skill points. As the game progresses, some of the dialogue contains suggestive remarks (e.g., “[The neighboring island's women] might be after my willy, innut? . . . there are worse things in life than letting a hot chick nibble on you!”). In one sequence, players' character can smoke from a hookah pipe. The words “sh*t,” “t*ts,” and “a*shole” can be heard in the dialogue.
